title: Zia Consulting to Present Activiti BPM on the AIIM 2015 Road Trip
text:
Presentations in New York City, Washington, D.C., Anaheim, and San Francisco will provide information on making ECM automated, easy, and secure while leveraging advanced workflow.
Boulder, CO
Zia Consulting, Inc., the leading provider of Enterprise Content Management (ECM) and Intelligent Document Capture business solutions, will be exhibiting and presenting at four AIIM 2015 Road Trip stops in October. The AIIM series will highlight the benefits of going paper-free, with Zia focusing on how to integrate business process management (BPM) tools to make your document and records management processes automated, easy, and secure.
In addition to exhibiting at the show, Zia will present “Why Solving Case Management is Critical to Delivering World-Class Customer Satisfaction and ROI” in each city. This talk will address reducing costs and increasing customer satisfaction, how to increase user adoption of your ECM using existing tools, and securing content anywhere.
Recently, Zia launched their newest solution, Accelerate document automation. Designed to deliver direct cost reductions along with productivity gains it provides a rapid ROI for banks, insurance companies, government organizations and within virtually any organization for use cases such as employee onboarding. Components of Accelerate include case management, advanced workflow, intelligent capture anywhere, records management, Universal Content Security, enterprise integration (ERP, LOS, etc.), and actionable analytics.
The advanced workflow portion of this solution is powered by Alfresco Activiti and provides a highly scalable, Java-based workflow and a Business Process Management (BPM) application targeted at business users, developers, and administrators. Designed to simplify the workflow process—and deliver enterprise-class BPM—Activiti brings a choice of editor, group and share packages of business processes. The technology also features a drag and drop forms editor and library, clustered process engine for enterprise scalability and resilience, and business process insight with actionable analytics.
“The goal with Activiti is to provide organizations with the most modern, open, enterprise-class BPM tool on the market today,” said Phil Robinson, SVP at Zia Consulting. “Activiti allows us to replace complex, manual workflow processes with powerful yet flexible automated solutions including the data analytics companies need.”
Those who are unable to attend but are interested in learning more can read the newly released Ephesoft whitepaper, "Is Big Data Big Enough?" and learn how IDC solutions from Ephesoft and Zia help enterprises achieve a paper-free office.
To register for one of these events, visit http://www.aiim.org/Events/RoadTrip2015 .
###
Zia Consulting delivers Enterprise Content Management (ECM) solutions that address the content chaos needs of your enterprise to better manage and secure the most important documents. As the leading partners for Alfresco and Ephesoft, we bring start-to-finish guidance and customization based on your organization’s needs. Our Adhere solution focuses on solving SharePoint and shared drives by identifying and classifying critical content, integrating ECM platforms, streamlining business processes, and then delivering content security, information governance, and federated search. Our Accelerate solution targets the costly and complex document processing tasks that exist from mortgage, insurance, government, and more. It provides case management, automated classification and extraction, BPM/Workflow, and enterprise integration, to deliver a rapid ROI.
